sections.heading: As used in this act:(1)“Department” means the Department of the Lottery
sections.text: (2)“Major procurement” means a procurement for a contract for the printing of tickets for use in any lottery game, consultation services for the startup of the lottery, any goods or services involving the official recording for

sections.heading: The venue for all civil or administrative actions against the department shall be in Leon County.History.—s. 10, ch. 87-65.
